Rule Description: Detects potential PwnKit exploitation CVE-2021-4034 in auth logs
Chinese Description: 检测验证日志中潜在的PWNKIT剥削CVE-2021-4034
Detection: {'keywords': {'|all': ['pkexec', 'The value for environment variable XAUTHORITY contains suscipious content', '[USER=root] [TTY=/dev/pts/0]']}, 'condition': 'keywords'}
SPL Query: "pkexec" "The value for environment variable XAUTHORITY contains suscipious content" "[USER=root] [TTY=/dev/pts/0]"
